description: Without a signed-in user: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete email in all mailboxes as well as send mail as any user. Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user's mailbox settings in all mailboxes. Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete events of all calendars. Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete all contacts in all mailboxes
